title: The people of Africa will overpower the colonisers! (Soviet poster, 1960)
Text: The people of Africa will overpower the colonisers!
Additional Information: A slightly tweaked version of the design by Biafran cartoonist Chuks Anyanwu shows a Biafran man overpowering both the colonialist (here depicted with a hammer-and-sickle on his chest) and Nigeria. Published during the Biafra War, 1968.
